turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you pick me up a drink at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly, which one are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 1501 East Broad, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. Can I take your order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay so first off, I want the biggest size you can get â€” I'm exhausted and need that caffeine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I believe that would be Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, great. I can never keep their terms in order. Anyway I'd like a Venti Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it Iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please. I'm cold enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Agreed. And do you want a specific kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What options do I have again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole, nonfat, almond, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh. Almond for sure, I think.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That can be done. And would you like the normal espresso shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, just two. And no fancy flavours.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So that will be one venti latte with almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I've placed your order at the Starbucks on East Broad and it should be ready in about eight minutes. Is that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. The receipt should be sent to your phone.
